subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Venus Williams beat Maria Sharapova, 6-4, 6-3, to win the JB Group Classic exhibition Saturday in Hong Kong, a warm-up event for the Australian Open. Serving at 4-5 in the first set, Sharapova sent a backhand into the net after a long rally, then missed another backhand to allow Williams to take a one-set lead. Sharapova was erratic in the second set. She trailed, 3-2, then double-faulted and missed a forehand to give Williams a crucial break.
